title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: duplex printed by engraved roller
description: Length of heavy, ribbed cotton printed on both sides in a cool palette of greens, blues and white. Design is a flat, stylized pattern of clumps of lotus and poppies, each one rising of the one below on a fan of curving stems. Areas between are filled with small thistles.
name: Textile
